rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: This space integrates the entrance hall with a living area. The design is minimalist, featuring neutral colors, exposed concrete finishes where possible, and large sliding glass doors for natural light while keeping within budget constraints.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: A compact, functional kitchen with basic appliances and storage solutions. Vastu considerations have been made to place the sink in an auspicious direction (east) for harmony.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Small bathroom with essential fixtures. The design uses simple materials that align with minimalist aesthetics while ensuring compliance with local building norms.

openings.location: Living Area to Swimming Pool area (if applicable)
openings.description: Allows seamless transition between indoor and outdoor spaces, promoting natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Minimalist bedroom featuring an open layout, integrated closet space, and a large window placed in accordance with Vastu to invite positivity.

rooms.name: Study Area/Workspace
rooms.description: Compact study area adaptable for home office purposes. Designed to maximize natural light while keeping the overall minimalist approach.

openings.description: Provides a small outdoor space and additional ventilation, carefully positioned following Vastu principles.
Ensures sufficient daylighting while maintaining privacy with minimalist design elements.

rooms.name: Additional Living Space / Storage
rooms.description: Multipurpose space that can serve as a guest room, storage area or extension of the living space. Designed to be flexible and cost-effective.
